author: anmenaga
body:
Start-PSBootstrap in "build.psm1" does not correctly install dependencies on Debian;
this results in failing to build using Start-PSBuild.

Steps to reproduce
------------------
Import-Module ./build.psm1
Start-PSBootstrap
Start-PSBuild -CrossGen -PSModuleRestore

Environment data
----------------
